expage-201611 - global glacial 10Be and 26Al exposure age data

Kong et al. (2009b)	boulder	Kong2009b-11	Kong2009b-E	YN-65	27.0530	100.2543	2960	2	2.65	1	291000	10000	NIST_Certified	1700000	580000	Z92-0222	2007	11300	800	9600	3300	14246	900	491	11807	4128	4052	-

Reference:
Kong P, Na CG, Fink D, Zhao XT, Xiao W, 2009b. Moraine dam related to late Quaternary glaciation in the Yulong Mountains, southwest China, and impacts on the Jinsha River. Quaternary Science Reviews 28, 3224-3235.

Data comments:
Sample thickness assumed to be 2.5 cm.
Sample density assumed to be 2.65 g/cm3.
Sampling year assumed to be 2007.
26Al standard assumed to be Z92-0222.
Sampling year assumed to be 2007.

expage.github.io
